Nick's Blog

My second facebook app

05 June 2007

Today my second Facebook app went out and so far the reception has been great. You can read the official blog post on the del.icio.us blog here.

Thanks go out to everyone on the del.icio.us team and especially Josh Whiting who helped get this out so quickly.

See for yourself: Facebook del.icio.us app

Update 2007-06-07 1:25pm: 1,000 users!
